text: @GENRayOdierno We have drug that prevents brain swelling from TBI, with a therapeutic index > 100. Safe in humans, we are ready for clinic.
@SteveFainaru btw - I developed the drug for stroke patients - but it is suitable for TBI/concussion.
@SteveFainaru With support from NIH, I have developed a drug that prevents CTE, One ready for the clinic at Yale (YNHH). We should talk.
@thurrott @davidwalljones And if you bought the movie, and didn't like it, refund the difference between purchase and rental.
@OfficialBrowns a local unknown biotech company has discovered a drug that blocks brain swelling, could protect players from brain trauma.
@GENRayOdierno my small biotech company has a drug that blocks brain edema, an important complication from TBI. We would love to help.

@TheSwordIsInYou Government will sadly only drive pharma projects so far, industry is responsible in bringing to market cures…
It was an experiment. @TheSwordIsInYou my concern is that many scientists are navel gazers, rather than translate their work to the clinic.
@TheSwordIsInYou Translating to the clinic is important part of what biotech is about. I am trying to figure out how to best encourage it.
